abstract: The platform on which to run the provider.
overview:
## Discussion

Xcode infers the platform for a preview based on the currently selected target. If you have a multiplatform target and want to suggest a particular target for a preview, implement the `platform` computed property to provide a hint, and specify one of the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/PreviewPlatform] values:

Xcode ignores this value unless you have a multiplatform target.
title: platform
